title: Slimtube Data Schema
description: A Slim Tube Test is used to study the miscibility condition of a reservoir oil sample when it comes in contact with a gas sample flowing inside a long tube filled with sand (porous media) in a near one-dimensional flow condition. In general, a number of slim tube tests are performed at constant temperature with varying pressures to determine the minimum pressure at which miscibility is achieved after injection of certain pore volume of gas.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

Meta.title: Meta

items.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data Item
items.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

kind.title: UOM Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, 'Unit' for FrameOfReferenceUOM.

name.title: UOM Unit Symbol
name.description: The unit symbol or name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: UOM Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the Unit.

unitOfMeasureID.description: SRN to unit of measure reference.

propertyNames.title: UOM Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides Unit context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: CRS Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'CRS' for FrameOfReferenceCRS.

persistableReference.title: CRS Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the CRS.

propertyNames.title: CRS Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides CRS context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: DateTime Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'DateTime', for FrameOfReferenceDateTime.

name.title: DateTime Name
name.description: The name of the DateTime format and reference.

persistableReference.title: DateTime Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying DateTime reference.

propertyNames.title: DateTime Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides DateTime context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: AzimuthReference Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'AzimuthReference', for FrameOfReferenceAzimuthReference.

name.title: AzimuthReference Name
name.description: The name of the CRS or the symbol/name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: AzimuthReference Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying AzimuthReference.

propertyNames.title: AzimuthReference Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides AzimuthReference context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

TestTemperature.title: Test Temperature
TestTemperature.description: The recorded temperature within the test environment.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Additional notes or observations regarding the test, conditions, or results that may be relevant for interpretation.

RemarkSequenceNumber.title: Remark Sequence Number
RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.title: Remark Date
RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.

PackedColumnProperties.title: Packed Column Properties
PackedColumnProperties.description: Physical properties of the packed column with sample.

items.title: Packed Column Properties
items.description: Physical properties of the packed column with sample.

ColumnLength.title: Column Length
ColumnLength.description: Length of the packed column enclosing the sample.

ColumnDiameter.title: Column Diameter
ColumnDiameter.description: Diameter of the packed column enclosing the sample.

PackingMaterial.title: Packing Material
PackingMaterial.description: Material used to fill the packed column, e.g. sand.

ColumnPorosity.title: Column Porosity
ColumnPorosity.description: The amount of pore space relative to the volume of the packed column sample.

ColumnTotalPoreVolume.title: Column Total Pore Volume
ColumnTotalPoreVolume.description: The total volume of pore space within the packed column.

CoreFlooding.title: Core Flooding
CoreFlooding.description: Core flooding is a laboratory technique used to simulate and analyze fluid flow and behavior in a reservoir rock under controlled conditions.

items.title: Core Flooding
items.description: Core flooding is a laboratory technique used to simulate and analyze fluid flow and behavior in a reservoir rock under controlled conditions.

DisplacementPressure.title: Displacement Pressure
DisplacementPressure.description: The minimum pressure required to initiate and sustain the movement of fluids through a porous medium.

PoreVolumeInjected.title: Pore Volume Injected
PoreVolumeInjected.description: The total volume of fluid injected into a reservoir relative to the volume of its pore spaces.

CumulativeOilRecovery.title: Cumulative Oil Recovery
CumulativeOilRecovery.description: The total amount of oil produced from a reservoir over a specified period.

MaterialBalance.title: Material Balance
MaterialBalance.description: A calculation assessing the consistency between the amounts of oil, gas, and water produced versus injected to evaluate reservoir performance.

AsphaltanceContentOfResidualOil.title: Asphaltance Content Of Residual Oil
AsphaltanceContentOfResidualOil.description: The concentration of heavy, complex hydrocarbons known as asphaltenes remaining in the residual oil after extraction processes.

MinimumMiscibilityPressure.title: Minimum Miscibility Pressure
MinimumMiscibilityPressure.description: The minimum pressure for miscibility to be achieved.

PackedColumnDisplacement.title: Packed Column Displacement
PackedColumnDisplacement.description: Array  of measurements recording the incremental and cumulative recovery of oil from the packed column.

items.title: Packed Column Displacement
items.description: Array  of measurements recording the incremental and cumulative recovery of oil from the packed column.

IncrementNumber.title: Increment Number
IncrementNumber.description: A sequential identifier representing the number of increments or stages in a process or measurement.

PoresInjected.title: Pores Injected
PoresInjected.description: The number of pore volumes of a fluid injected into a reservoir during enhanced oil recovery processes.

CumulativeOilRecoveryVolume.title: Cumulative Oil Recovery Volume
CumulativeOilRecoveryVolume.description: The total volume of oil extracted from a reservoir over a specified period.

CumulativeOilRecoveryWeight.title: Cumulative Oil Recovery Weight
CumulativeOilRecoveryWeight.description: The total weight of oil extracted from a reservoir over a specified period.

GasOilRatio.title: Gas Oil Ratio
GasOilRatio.description: The volume ratio of produced gas to produced oil from a reservoir.

GasGravity.title: Gas Gravity
GasGravity.description: The relative density of produced gas compared to air.

OilDensity.title: Oil Density
OilDensity.description: The mass per unit volume of oil, typically measured in kilograms per cubic meter (kg/m³) or grams per cubic centimeter (g/cm³).

MaterialBalanceData.title: Material Balance Data
MaterialBalanceData.description: Array that records the type and weight of the material injected into the sample as well as the material recovered.

items.title: Material Balance Data
items.description: Array that records the type and weight of the material injected into the sample as well as the material recovered.

MaterialInjectedWeight.title: Material Injected Weight
MaterialInjectedWeight.description: The weight of the material injected

MaterialRecoveredWeight.title: Material Recovered Weight
MaterialRecoveredWeight.description: The weight of the recovered material.

MaterialRecoveredCumulativeWeight.title: Material Recovered Cumulative Weight
MaterialRecoveredCumulativeWeight.description: The cumulative weight of the recovered material since the start of injection.

VaporCompositionalAnalysis.title: Vapor Compositional Analysis
VaporCompositionalAnalysis.description: Array recording the compositional analysis of the vapor retrieved from the sample.

items.title: Vapor Compositional Analysis
items.description: Array recording the compositional analysis of the vapor retrieved from the sample.

IncrementNumberSampled.title: Increment Number Sampled
IncrementNumberSampled.description: A sequential identifier representing the number of specific sampling points or intervals taken during a measurement or observation process.

PoreVolumeInjected.title: Pore Volume Injected
PoreVolumeInjected.description: The cumulative volume of fluid injected into a reservoir expressed as a proportion of the total pore volume within the reservoir.

VaporComposition.title: Vapor Composition
VaporComposition.description: Object capturing the component name and molar weight of this component of the vapor.

items.title: Vapor Composition
items.description: Object capturing the component name and molar weight of this component of the vapor.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: The chemical formula of each component found in the vapor during analysis.

VaporRelativeMole.title: Vapor Relative Mole
VaporRelativeMole.description: The molar weight of the component relative to the vapor.

LiquidCompositionalAnalysis.title: Liquid Compositional Analysis
LiquidCompositionalAnalysis.description: Array recording the compositional analysis of the liquid retrieved from the sample.

items.title: Liquid Compositional Analysis
items.description: Array recording the compositional analysis of the liquid retrieved from the sample.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: The chemical formula of each component found in the liquid during analysis.

LiquidRelativeMolarWeight.title: Liquid Relative Molar Weight
LiquidRelativeMolarWeight.description: The molar weight of the component relative to the liquid.

FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.title: Flashed Liquid Relative Mass
FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the flashed liquid.

CalculatedProperties.title: Calculated Properties
CalculatedProperties.description: Derived attributes and parameters obtained from slim tube tests, which are experimental methods used to evaluate the miscibility and interaction of injected fluids with reservoir hydrocarbons under simulated reservoir conditions.

items.title: Calculated Properties
items.description: Derived attributes and parameters obtained from slim tube tests, which are experimental methods used to evaluate the miscibility and interaction of injected fluids with reservoir hydrocarbons under simulated reservoir conditions.

AvgMoleWeight.title: Average Mole Weight
AvgMoleWeight.description: The weighted average mass of the molecules in a sample.

ResidueDensity.title: Residue Density
ResidueDensity.description: The mass per unit volume of the residual oil.

ResidueAPI.title: Residue API
ResidueAPI.description: The API gravity of the residual oil, which measures its density relative to water.

ResidueCalculatedProperties.title: Residue Calculated Properties
ResidueCalculatedProperties.description: The set of derived physical and chemical properties of the residual oil, calculated from experimental data or using theoretical models.

items.title: Residue Calculated Properties
items.description: The set of derived physical and chemical properties of the residual oil, calculated from experimental data or using theoretical models.

ComponentNameID.title: Component Name ID
ComponentNameID.description: The chemical formula representing the composition of a specific component in terms of the elements and their proportions.

ResidueRelativeMolarWeight.title: Residue Relative Molar Weight
ResidueRelativeMolarWeight.description: he ratio of the molar mass of the residual oil component to the molar mass of a reference substance, typically dimensionless.

ResidueMolecularWeight.title: Residue Molecular Weight
ResidueMolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the residual oil, representing the sum of the atomic weights of its constituent atoms.

ResidueDensity.title: Residue Density
ResidueDensity.description: The mass per unit volume of the residual oil.

SlimTubeTestSteps.title: SlimTubeTest Steps
SlimTubeTestSteps.description: Array object capturing the slim tube test steps.

items.title: Slim Tube Test Steps
items.description: Array object capturing the slim tube test steps.

StepAveragePressure.title: Step Average Pressure
StepAveragePressure.description: Average pressure applied in this step of the SLim Tube Test

StepNumber.description: The number used to sequence and identify the changes in volume for this analysis.

DifferentialPressure.title: Differential Pressure
DifferentialPressure.description: The differential pressure of this test step.

RunTime.title: Run Time
RunTime.description: The overall run time of the test at this step.

InjectionVolumeAtTestTemperature.title: Injection Volume At Test Temperature
InjectionVolumeAtTestTemperature.description: The volume of injected fluid at test temperature.

InjectionVolumeAtPumpTemperature.title: Injection Volume At Pump Temperature
InjectionVolumeAtPumpTemperature.description: The volume of injected fluid measured at pump temperature.

InjectedPoreVolumeFraction.title: Injected Pore Volume Fraction
InjectedPoreVolumeFraction.description: The injected fluid measured as a fraction of pore volume

DarcyVelocity.title: Darcy Velocity
DarcyVelocity.description: The flow velocity of a fluid through a porous medium, as described by Darcy's law.

CumulativeOilProductionPercOOIP.title: Cumulative Oil Production Percentage of Oil in Place
CumulativeOilProductionPercOOIP.description: Cumulative oil production as a percentage of oil in place.

IncrementalProducedGOR.title: Incremental Produced GOR
IncrementalProducedGOR.description: Gas oil ratio of the production during this test step.

CumulativeProducedGOR.title: Cumulative Produced GOR
CumulativeProducedGOR.description: Gas Oil ratio of the cumulative production from the sample during slim tube testing.
